#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This manager keep tracks of the pathologies of the patient.


= GUI=

A splitted screen with the first half showing a grid with the pathologies and the durations.

The other half is a TabControl that shows different charts.

= Features =
this manager
 * allows to add, remove or update a pathology (disease name, type and duration)
 * Display a time line showing when the patient is ill
 * Display a time line showing when the patient is ill by month
 * Display a chart showing the 10 disease the patient suffer the most often.
